conditions.name: Wired_MAB
conditions.description: A condition to match MAC Authentication Bypass service based authentication requests from switches, according to the corresponding MAB attributes defined in the device profile.

conditions.name: Wireless_MAB
conditions.description: A condition to match MAC Authentication Bypass service based authentication requests from wireless LAN controllers, according to the corresponding MAB attributes defined in the device profile.

conditions.name: Wired_802.1X
conditions.description: A condition to match 802.1X based authentication requests from switches, according to the corresponding 802.1x attributes defined in the device profile.

conditions.name: Wireless_802.1X
conditions.description: A condition to match 802.1X based authentication requests from wireless LAN controllers, according to the corresponding 802.1x attributes defined in the device profile.

conditions.name: Wired_MAB
conditions.description: A condition to match MAC Authentication Bypass service based authentication requests from switches, according to the corresponding MAB attributes defined in the device profile.

conditions.name: Wireless_Access
conditions.description: Default condition used to match any authentication request from Cisco Wireless LAN Controller.

conditions.name: IdentityGroup
conditions.description: Name equals Endpoint Identity Groups:Blocked List

conditions.name: Non_Cisco_Profiled_Phones
conditions.description: Default condition used to match Non Cisco IP Phones

conditions.name: Network_Access_Authentication_Passed
conditions.description: Default condition used for basic Network Access requiring that authentication was successful.
